**Ibiza 2023**

Ibiza is not only a party island. Its definately more than that:

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
#| include: false
#| warning: false

#install.packages("ggthemes")
library(ggmap)
library(maps)
library(ggthemes)
library(tibble)


df_places <- tibble(
  place = c("Sant Antoni de Portmany",
               "Aeroport Eivissa",
               "Eivissa Port"),
  long = c(1.30247, 1.36696, 1.43792),
  lat = c(38.98248, 38.87766, 38.91489)
  )
 

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
#| include: false
#| warning: false
ibiza_map <- ggmap::get_stamenmap(
  bbox = c(left = 0.97, bottom = 38.75, right = 1.86, top = 39.1865)
)

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
ggmap::ggmap(ibiza_map) + 
  geom_point(data = df_places,
             aes(x= long, y = lat),
             size = 2.3)+
  theme_map()

```
